packageRules.description: Fix subchart archives for helm chart
Fix version in Chart.yaml after helmv3 dep patch updates
Fix version in Chart.yaml after helmv3 dep minor updates
Fix version in Chart.yaml after helmv3 dep major updates

Bump helm chart versions by a patch when updating values files. Digests, pins, rollbacks, replacements and pinDigest updates are deliberately ignored since in our use case, these need a manual decision about the version bump for the chart. This can be removed when https://github.com/renovatebot/renovate/issues/8231 is implemented and enabled.
